word: he will cut him to pieces
parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a compound of a derivative of dis and a derivative of temno; to bisect, i.e. to flog severely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From hupokrinomai; an actor under an assumed character, i.e. a dissembler
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Weeping, lamentation, crying. From klaio; lamentation.
A grinding or gnashing. From brucho; a grating.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A tooth. Perhaps from the base of esthio; a 'tooth'.
